Class BudgetController

java.lang.Object
BudgetController
public class BudgetController extends Object
Controller class for managing budget operations. Handles business logic for budget creation, updates, deletions, and notifications.
Author:
Kholod Ahmed

  • Constructor Details

    • BudgetController

      public BudgetController(BudgetDatabase database, NotificationController notificationController)
      Constructs a BudgetController with the specified database and notification controller.
      Parameters:
      database - the BudgetDatabase instance for data persistence
      notificationController - the NotificationController for sending user alerts

  • Method Details

    • setBudget

      public boolean setBudget(Budget budget)
      Creates a new budget if the amount is positive. Sends a notification upon successful creation.
      Parameters:
      budget - the Budget object to create
      Returns:
      true if the budget was successfully saved, false otherwise

    • updateBudget

      public boolean updateBudget(Budget updatedBudget)
      Updates an existing budget. Sends a notification upon successful update.
      Parameters:
      updatedBudget - the Budget object with updated information
      Returns:
      true if the budget was found and updated, false otherwise

    • deleteBudget

      public boolean deleteBudget(int userId, int budgetId)
      Deletes a budget for a specific user. Sends a notification upon successful deletion.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user who owns the budget
      budgetId - the ID of the budget to delete
      Returns:
      true if the budget was found and deleted, false otherwise

    • getBudgetSummary

      public List<Budget> getBudgetSummary(int userId)
      Retrieves all budgets for a specific user.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user whose budgets to retrieve
      Returns:
      a List of Budget objects belonging to the specified user

    • updateremainingBudgets

      public boolean updateremainingBudgets(Budget updatedremaining)
      Updates the remaining amount of a budget. Sends a notification upon successful update.
      Parameters:
      updatedremaining - the Budget object with updated remaining amount
      Returns:
      true if the budget was found and updated, false otherwise
